name: Project W.I.P.E.D
description:
https://rpgmaker.net/games/9542/

You wake up in a strange room with no memories of your life before this point. You are wondering what to do when a strange voice speaks to you through a pair of headphones you hadn't realised you were wearing. It tells you that he is a hacker who has freed you and that he will help you escape, but you must follow his directions. Will you be able to escape? Just who is this hacker and where is he leading you? 

Average duration: 30 Minutes

- What you choose during the game will make an impact on the gameplay.
- Time your abilities precisely in order to destroy enemies shields without letting your shields down.
- Quality over Quantity; small amount of fights but challenging to pass through.
